description: Vouchers are permanent upgrades purchased from the shop that last for the entire run.

vouchers.effect_en: +1 card slot available in shop (to 3 slots)
vouchers.effect_zh: 商店 +1 卡片欄位（共 3 欄）

upgrade.effect_en: +1 card slot available in shop (to 4 slots)
upgrade.effect_zh: 商店 +1 卡片欄位（共 4 欄）
upgrade.unlock_condition: Spend a total of $2500 at the shop

vouchers.effect_en: All cards and packs in shop are 25% off
vouchers.effect_zh: 商店所有卡片和卡包 75 折

upgrade.effect_en: All cards and packs in shop are 50% off
upgrade.effect_zh: 商店所有卡片和卡包 5 折
upgrade.unlock_condition: Redeem at least 10 Voucher cards in one run

vouchers.effect_en: Foil, Holographic, and Polychrome cards appear 2X more often
vouchers.effect_zh: 閃卡、全息、幻彩卡片出現機率 2 倍

upgrade.effect_en: Foil, Holographic, and Polychrome cards appear 4X more often
upgrade.effect_zh: 閃卡、全息、幻彩卡片出現機率 4 倍
upgrade.unlock_condition: Have at least 5 Joker cards with Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome effect
Reroll the shop a total of 100 times

upgrade.effect_en: Spectral cards may appear in any of the Arcana Packs
upgrade.effect_zh: 秘法包可能出現幻靈牌
upgrade.unlock_condition: Use a total of 25 Tarot cards from booster packs

vouchers.effect_en: Celestial Packs always contain the Planet card for your most played poker hand
vouchers.effect_zh: 天體包必定包含你最常出的牌型對應的星球牌

upgrade.effect_en: Planet cards in your consumable area give X1.5 Mult for their specified poker hand
upgrade.effect_zh: 消耗品區的星球牌為其對應牌型提供 X1.5 倍率
upgrade.unlock_condition: Use a total of 25 Planet cards from booster packs

vouchers.effect_zh: 每回合永久 +1 出牌次數

upgrade.effect_en: Permanently gain an additional +1 hand per round
upgrade.effect_zh: 每回合再 +1 出牌次數

vouchers.effect_zh: 每回合永久 +1 棄牌次數

upgrade.effect_en: Permanently gain an additional +1 discard each round
upgrade.effect_zh: 每回合再 +1 棄牌次數

vouchers.effect_en: Tarot cards appear 2X more frequently in the shop
vouchers.effect_zh: 塔羅牌在商店出現機率 2 倍

upgrade.effect_en: Tarot cards appear 4X more frequently in the shop
upgrade.effect_zh: 塔羅牌在商店出現機率 4 倍
upgrade.unlock_condition: Buy a total of 50 Tarot cards from the shop

vouchers.effect_en: Planet cards appear 2X more frequently in the shop
vouchers.effect_zh: 星球牌在商店出現機率 2 倍

upgrade.effect_en: Planet cards appear 4X more frequently in the shop
upgrade.effect_zh: 星球牌在商店出現機率 4 倍
upgrade.unlock_condition: Buy a total of 50 Planet cards from the shop

vouchers.effect_en: Raise the cap on interest earned in each round to $10
vouchers.effect_zh: 每回合利息上限提高至 $10

upgrade.effect_en: Raise the cap on interest earned in each round to $20
upgrade.effect_zh: 每回合利息上限提高至 $20
upgrade.unlock_condition: Max out interest earnings for 10 consecutive rounds

vouchers.effect_en: Playing cards can be purchased from the shop
vouchers.effect_zh: 可以在商店購買撲克牌

upgrade.effect_en: Playing cards in shop may have an Enhancement, Edition, and/or a Seal
upgrade.effect_zh: 商店的撲克牌可能有強化、版本和/或封印
upgrade.unlock_condition: Buy a total of 20 Playing cards from the shop

vouchers.effect_zh: -1 底注，每回合 -1 出牌次數

upgrade.effect_zh: 再 -1 底注，每回合 -1 棄牌次數

vouchers.effect_en: Reroll Boss Blind 1 time per Ante, $10 per roll
vouchers.effect_zh: 每底注可重擲 Boss 盲注 1 次，每次 $10

upgrade.effect_en: Reroll Boss Blind unlimited times, $10 per roll
upgrade.effect_zh: 可無限次重擲 Boss 盲注，每次 $10

upgrade.unlock_condition: Reduce your hand size down to 5 cards

notes: Upgraded Vouchers become available after purchasing their base version
Vouchers are permanent for the entire run
Only 1 Voucher is available per shop visit (2 after beating first Boss Blind)
